name: kyc_verification_workflow
description: Comprehensive Know Your Customer (KYC) verification workflow that collects and validates essential identity information including full legal name, identification document type and number, residential address, contact phone number, and date of birth. This workflow ensures regulatory compliance and enables secure financial services access by verifying customer identity before account activation, payment processing, or loan approval. The collected information is submitted for review and processing, which typically takes 24-48 hours to complete.
guidelines: Use a warm, reassuring, and professional tone. Collect information one field at a time, allowing the user to provide each detail at their own pace. Explain why each piece of information is required for compliance purposes. Reassure the user about data security and confidentiality. Be patient and supportive, especially if the user seems hesitant.

id_type.description: What type of identification document will you be using

full_name.description: Your full legal name as it appears on your ID

workflow_metadata.note: Collects and submits KYC data for review (processing may take 24-48 hours).

name: payment_processing_workflow
description: Complete payment processing workflow that collects payment details and initiates the payment
guidelines: Use a clear, efficient, and professional tone. Collect payment details in a logical sequence: start with amount and currency, then beneficiary information, and finally payment method. Move at a steady pace - not too rushed, but also not overly slow since payments are time-sensitive. Double-check critical details like amount and beneficiary account before proceeding. Be concise but thorough when explaining each field.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the source account

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer

beneficiaryAccount.description: Account number or identifier of the beneficiary

method.description: Payment method (bank_transfer, mobile_money, card) - defaults to bank_transfer

action_target.note: Account must be fully opened and active before initiating this payment.
KYC must be approved before proceeding with the payment.

workflow_metadata.note: Payment processing with full validation chain

name: loan_application_workflow
description: Complete loan application workflow that collects loan details and submits the application
guidelines: Use a supportive, encouraging, and professional tone. Collect information in a structured manner: start with loan type and amount, then purpose, followed by financial details (income, employment), and finally loan terms. Take your time with sensitive financial information - allow the user to feel comfortable sharing. Explain how each piece of information helps assess their loan application. Be empathetic and understanding, as loan applications can be stressful for users.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer applying for the loan

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the loan

loan_amount.description: Loan amount in GHâ‚µ (must be between 1,000 and 1,000,000)

loan_purpose.description: Purpose or reason for the loan

preferred_term_months.description: Preferred loan term in months (must be between 6 and 360)

action_target.note: An active account may be required before loan eligibility can be determined.
User KYC must be approved before submitting the loan application.

name: account_creation
description: Account creation workflow that collects account details and creates a new account
guidelines: Use a welcoming, friendly, and helpful tone. Collect information at a comfortable pace, one field at a time. Start with account type and explain the differences between savings and current accounts clearly. Then collect currency preference and initial deposit amount. Be enthusiastic about helping them open their new account. Provide clear explanations of account features and benefits as you collect each detail.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer

type.description: Type of account to create (savings or current)

currency.description: Currency code for the account (e.g., GHS, USD, EUR, NGN)

initialDeposit.description: Initial deposit amount (defaults to 0 if not provided)

action_target.note: KYC must be approved before the account can be activated.
